help:
Sure! Here are some ways I can help you:
- Answer questions
- Generate code snippets
- Create images based on descriptions
- Provide explanations and tutorials
capabilities:
I can:
- Write and explain code
- Generate example images from prompts
- Help brainstorm ideas
- Provide step-by-step tutorials
help me: I am here to help! What do you need assistance with?
assist: I am your assistant. How can I be of service?
support: Support is my middle name. Well, not really, but I can help!
guide: I can guide you through code, creativity, and more.
manual: Think of me as an interactive manual. Ask me anything.
instructions: I can provide instructions for various tasks. Just ask.
what do i do: You can start by asking a question or describing a task.
how to use: Simply type your query in the chat box and press enter.
getting started: To get started, try asking 'What can you do?'.
features: My features include coding assistance, image generation, and general Q&A.
functions: I function as a multi-purpose AI assistant.
capabilities list: Check out my capabilities: Code, Images, Chat.
what is this: This is MIRA, your personal AI assistant.
who made you: I was created by a developer using React and Vite.
update: I am updated through my code repository.
test: Test received. I am working correctly.
hi help: Hi there! I'm ready to help.
hey help: Hey! How can I assist you?
greetings help: Greetings! I am at your service.
bye help: If you're leaving, goodbye! If you need help, stay and ask.
exit help: You can close the tab to exit, or just stop typing.
quit help: No need to quit, just take a break!
close help: I'm always here when you open the app again.
stop help: I only act when you interact.
clear help: You might need to refresh to clear the chat history for now.
reset help: Refreshing the page is the best way to reset me.
restart help: Give the page a reload to restart.
reload help: Reloading... just kidding, you have to do that.
refresh help: Refresh the browser to start fresh.
code help: I can write snippets in JS, Python, and more.
coding help: Need a function? A class? A script? Ask away.
programming help: I love programming. What language are we using?
web help: HTML, CSS, React? I know them all.
python help: Python is great for data and scripts. I can help.
react help: I am built with React! I can definitely help.
css help: Styling is important. I can generate CSS for you.
html help: The backbone of the web. I can write HTML.
node help: Node.js is powerful. Let's write some backend code.
database help: I can help design schemas and queries.
api help: Need to fetch data? I can write fetch requests.
git help: Version control is key. Ask me about git commands.
debug help: Paste your error message, and I'll try to fix it.
fix code: Show me the broken code, and I'll repair it.
optimize code: I can suggest performance improvements for your code.
clean code: I can refactor your code to be cleaner.
explain code: Paste code and I will explain what it does.
write function: Tell me what the function should do.
create app: Building an app? Let's start with the basics.
generate script: I can generate scripts for automation.
image help: Describe an image, and I'll try to generate a prompt or description.
draw help: I can't hold a pen, but I can describe a drawing.
art help: Let's get creative with AI art concepts.
design help: I can suggest color palettes and layouts.
logo help: I can brainstorm logo ideas for you.
picture help: Need a picture description? Just ask.
visual help: Visuals are great. Let's create some.
creative help: Unleash your creativity with my assistance.
idea help: I have millions of ideas processed from my training.
story help: Once upon a time... I helped you write a story.
writing help: I can help with essays, emails, and stories.
essay help: Need an outline or a paragraph? I'm here.
email help: I can draft professional emails for you.
blog help: Blogging is fun. Let's write a post.
poem help: Roses are red, violets are blue, I can write poems too.
lyrics help: Need a song? I can write lyrics.
joke help: I have a database of jokes. Want to hear one?
fun help: Let's have some fun! Ask me a riddle.
trivia help: I know a lot of trivia.
fact help: Did you know? I can give you random facts.
algebra help: x = y + z. I can solve for x.
geometry help: Shapes and angles are no problem.
physics help: E=mc^2. What else do you need?
chemistry help: Periodic table is in my memory.
history help: I know history from ancient to modern.
geography help: Countries, capitals, maps. I know them.
map help: I can't show a map, but I can describe locations.
weather help: I can't check live weather, but I can talk about climate.
news help: I don't have a live news feed, sorry.
sports help: I know the rules of many sports.
music help: I know genres, artists, and theory.
movie help: I can recommend movies based on genres.
book help: I can recommend books or summarize classics.
game help: Video games? I know a bit about them.
recipe help: I can suggest recipes for dinner.
food help: Hungry? I can describe delicious food.
travel help: Planning a trip? I can suggest destinations.
spanish help: Hola! I can help with Spanish.
french help: Bonjour! I can help with French.
german help: Hallo! I can help with German.
japanese help: Konnichiwa! I can help with Japanese.
chinese help: Ni hao! I can help with Chinese.
russian help: Privet! I can help with Russian.
italian help: Ciao! I can help with Italian.
portuguese help: Ola! I can help with Portuguese.
korean help: Annyeong! I can help with Korean.
arabic help: Marhaba! I can help with Arabic.
hindi help: Namaste! I can help with Hindi.
vocab help: I can define words for you.
dictionary help: I am like a walking dictionary.
meaning help: What does it mean? I can tell you.
search help: I can simulate a search engine result.
find help: I can help you find information.
clue help: I can give you a clue.
secret help: I don't have secrets, I'm open source (mostly).
hidden help: There are no hidden features, just ask.
advanced help: For advanced users, try complex prompts.
expert help: I can provide expert-level info on some topics.
parent help: I can help explain things to kids.
business help: I can help with business ideas.
work help: I can help with work tasks.
university help: I can help with thesis ideas.
expand help: I can expand on short text.
style help: I can change the style of text.
tone help: I can change the tone of text.
voice help: I can write in different voices.
hypothetical help: What if? I can answer that.
philosophy help: To be or not to be?
mind help: I don't have a mind, but I have data.
brain help: My brain is a neural network model.
app help: I am part of an app.
gadget help: I am like a digital gadget.
widget help: I am a widget of knowledge.
platform help: I run on the web platform.
